Class Die

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.Model.Die

  • public class Die
extends java.lang.Object
    Die class of the game. Contains methods to handle colors and values of dice.
    Author:
    Ibrahim El Shemy

    • Method Detail

      • getColor

        public Color getColor()

      • setColor

        public void setColor(Color color)

      • getValue

        public int getValue()

      • setValue

        public void setValue(int value)
              throws InvalidDieException
        This setter method assigns values between 1 and 6 to a certain die. If the value is out of the range, an exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        value - Refers to the value of the die.
        Throws:
        InvalidDieException - Makes sure that no invalid die should be created.

      • reverse

        public void reverse(Die d)
             throws InvalidDieException
        This method takes a die as a parameter and returns its reversed value.
        Parameters:
        d - Refers to the die I want to reverse.
        Throws:
        InvalidDieException - Makes sure that no invalid die should be given to the method.
